 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּצַר‎</span>] **verb** ==push, press== (perhaps related, by transposition, to Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***appoint, prescribe***, Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***parƒu***</u></abbr>, ***command***, compare [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ZMG xliii (1889), 188</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּפְצַרֿ‎</span> [[Gen.19.3|Gen 19:3]] +, 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּפְצְרוּ‎</span> v[[Gen.19.9|Gen 19:9]]; [[2Kgs.2.17|2Kgs 2:17]] — ***push, press***, upon (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> person) physically [[Gen.19.2|Gen 19:2]] = ***urge*** v[[Gen.19.3|Gen 19:3]]; [[Gen.33.11|Gen 33:11]]; [[Judg.19.7|Judg 19:7]]; [[2Kgs.2.17|2Kgs 2:17]], + infinitive [[2Kgs.5.16|2Kgs 5:16]] read also probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּפְצַרבּֿוֺ‎</span> [[2Sam.13.25|2Sam 13:25]]; [[2Sam.13.27|2Sam 13:27]]; [[2Kgs.5.23|2Kgs 5:23]] (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּפְרָץֿ‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּפְצְרוּבֿוֺ‎</span> [[1Sam.28.23|1Sam 28:23]] (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּפְרְצוּֿ‎</span>), Tanchum (compare The), Weir in [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>[[1Sam.28.23|1Sam 28:23]]</sup> [[BDB#Kit|Kit]]<sup>id.</sup> [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] Löhr. **Hiph\`il** ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַפְצַ֑ר‎</span> [[1Sam.15.23|1Sam 15:23]] ***to display pushing*** (i.e. arrogance, presumption; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֶ֔רִי‎</span>; compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]).
